nodes.text: The Star Wars Character Encyclopedia is a visual guide to the characters of the first six films of the Star Wars saga, similar to the Star Wars: The Clone Wars Character Encyclopedia. The encyclopedia details facts about 201 characters from the series. It was released on June 20, 2011.
Obi-Wan Kenobi's homeworld is mistakenly identified as Coruscant despite being revealed in 2010 as Stewjon.
The book features several photos from unseen alternate angles and unused scenes.
